SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The main application class for simulating a rocket launch scenario.
AssemblyComponent
Represents an assembly component used in Rocket construction.
BodyComponent
Represents a body component used in rocket construction.
BodyTube
Represents a body tube component used in rocket construction.
CenteringRing
Represents a centering ring, which is an inner component used in rocket construction to provide structural support and alignment within the rocket body.
Component
The Component class is used for building rockets.
ComponentBase
The ComponentBase class represents the basic attributes of a component used in rocket construction.
EmptyArrayException
Exception thrown to indicate that an array of components is empty, which is not allowed.
EmptyStringException
Signals that a string value is empty, which is not allowed.
Event<T>
The Event class represents an event that carries information of type T.
EventBus
The EventBus class implements the EventBus pattern, which uses a bus-like architecture to allow multiple classes to exchange events.
EventListener
The EventListener interface represents an object that can handle events of specific types.
EventType
Represents different types of events that can occur in rocket systems.
Fin
Represents a stabilizing fin component attached to the tail of a rocket.
FinShape
Represents the shape of a Fin.
FlightPhases
Represents different flight phases of a rocket, used for determining the appropriate actions to be taken during different stages of flight, such as deploying parachutes.
InnerComponent
Represents an inner component used in rocket construction.
InnerEngine
Represents an inner engine component used in rocket construction.
ManoeuveringEngine
Represents an manoeuvering engine component used in rocket construction.
MassComponent
Represents a mass component used in rocket construction.
Material
Represents materials that can be used in rocket components.
MotorMount
The MotorMount interface represents a rocket engine mount.
NonPositiveNumberException
Signals that a numeric argument must be positive, but a non-positive value was encountered.
NoseCone
Represents a nose cone assembly component used in rocket construction.
NoseConeShape
Represents the shape of a nose cone used in rocket assemblies.
NumberException
Signals that a numeric argument has an invalid value.
Parachute
Represents a parachute component used in rocket construction.
Physical
The Physical interface represents physical dimensions and weight of an object.
RequirementHandler
The RequirementHandler class provides utility methods for checking requirements on various types of input values commonly used in rocket component definitions.
Rocket
Rocket represents a rocket intended for a long journey.
Rotatable
The Rotatable interface is designed for components that can be rotated.
Stage
Represents a stage assembly component used in rocket construction.
StageNotExistsException
Signals that an attempt was made to access a non-existent rocket stage.
Transition
Represents a transition component used in rocket body construction.
TransitionShape
Represents the shape of a transition component used in rocket body assemblies.
Trapezoidal
Represents a trapezoidal inner component used in rocket construction.
Vector
The Vector class is used to store a vector in 3D space.
